item.title: Australia revokes visa of South African seen at neo-Nazi rally
item.description: The civil engineer was seen in the front row of a protest organised by the National Socialist Network.

item.title: Trump calls on House Republicans to vote to release Epstein files
item.description: "We have nothing to hide," the US president writes - a reversal after previously resisting publishing the documents.

item.title: Ukraine to import US liquefied natural gas via Greece
item.description: Vital supplies are due to start flowing from the Balkans as energy infrastructure faces sustained Russian attack.

item.title: Watch: Hundreds of sheep cross historic German city during annual tradition
item.description: The event, which saw about 600 sheep cross the Nuremberg's historic centre, took place on Sunday and has become a popular annual tradition.

item.title: Teacher killed and 25 girls abducted in gunbattle at Nigerian school
item.description: The army is called in to help the police search nearby forests and rescue the kidnapped girls.
